import React from 'react'; import { useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const BookingConfirmation = () => { const location = useLocation(); const { slotDateTime, meetingLink } = location.state || {}; if (!slotDateTime) { return (

No booking information found

Please use the invitation link sent to your email.

 ); } return (

Booking Confirmed!

Your interview has been successfully scheduled

Interview Details

Date & Time:
{new Date(slotDateTime).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}
{new Date(slotDateTime).toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })}

{meetingLink && (
)}
Important Reminders:
  • Join the meeting 5 minutes before the scheduled time
  • Ensure you have a stable internet connection
  • Test your camera and microphone beforehand
  • Keep a copy of your resume ready
  • Find a quiet, well-lit space for the interview
A confirmation email has been sent to your registered email address with all the details.
); }; export default BookingConfirmation;
